content.text:
[@punkmonk](@EaYYQo5nAQRabB9nxAn5i2uiIZ665b90Qk2U/WHNVE8=.ed25519)

Maybe you know -- should my Dat archive be one file per message, or one huge JSON file with all of my messages? The granularity of one-file-per-message seems nice, but I wonder whether there's an overhead for each file.
